title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying gold in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person buying gold in a dream. The income is in interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person buying gold in a dream. Seeing a dead person buying gold in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. If he sees If the deceased bought him gold, this may indicate a financial loss that the dreamer may suffer during these days. A dream of a deceased person buying expensive gold in a dream may indicate the deceased’s need for prayers and almsgiving for him in that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person buying furniture in a dreamIn case Whether one sees that the deceased was buying furniture for the house, this may indicate positive changes occurring to the dreamer to a large extent during this period. When you see the deceased buying furniture in the neighborhood in a dream, this may indicate good changes occurring to the dreamer during this period, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of a dead person buying furniture for the house in a dream, may indicate great livelihood and good events that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Seeing the deceased buying furniture for his house in a dream may indicate changes that will happen to the people of the house or joys that will come to them, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying vegetables in a dream: If you see a dead person buying vegetables in a dream, this may indicate the great choices that come to the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. When you see the dead buying vegetables for the living in your dream, this may indicate the abundance of a good and broad diet. Which you will get during this time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that the deceased was buying vegetables for the neighborhood may indicate future joys for the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. In the event that he sees the deceased buying vegetables, this could indicate the end of debts and financial crises that the dreamer faced in The previous period, thanks to God. Interpretation of dreams for a dead person to buy fish in a dream. If one sees that a deceased person was buying a fish in a dream, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrow from the dreamer’s life during this period, thanks to God. Anyone who sees in a dream that a dead person was buying a fish, It may indicate rejection of the intense sadness that the dreamer was suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Dreaming of a deceased person buying fish in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. And in the event that one sees that the deceased was buying fish and offering Fried fish, this may indicate that he heard happy news during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying medicine in a dream. If a person sees a deceased person buying medicine in a dream, this may indicate his faults that were present in his life, and God knows best. If a person sees If the dead person was buying medicine, this may indicate that he asked for prayers for him from his household at that time. Seeing the dead person buying medicine in a dream may mean that the dead person needed alms from the living in those days, and God knows best. The dead person’s complaint about an illness he was suffering from. From him and ask for medicine, you may

title: What do you know about the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: A snake in a dream for a single woman: A snake in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the things that makes her feel panicked, and seeing a snake in reality causes panic to the soul and poison in it. If a person or animal is infected with it, he or she will die. Immediately, could seeing him in a dream be a good sign? This is what we will learn in our topic today. What is the interpretation of a snake in a dream for a single woman? The snake is not much different in a dream than in reality, just as it is an old enemy that one fears in reality to be exposed to or overtaken, so in a dream one must also be careful when seeing it. . Be more careful and careful in the future. But there are some circumstances in which snakes appear and make the vision turn from negative to positive, so let us learn about these and other conditions so that the girl can stand in all the possibilities that the vision has. Seeing a girl coiling a snake and trying to approach it represents a handsome young man with a nice behavior. But at the same time, he has bad intentions towards the girl and wants to trap her for evil purposes. If she sees the snake wrapped around her neck and almost suffocates, then her vision indicates that she has fallen into many problems that make her suffer for a long time due to her inability to get rid of them. As for If she was able to untie it around her neck and throw it away from her, then seeing it is a sign that she is overcoming these problems and getting rid of the reasons that made her feel anxious and sad. If the girl is engaged and will set a date for her wedding but she does not feel happy and finds in her heart what makes her feel uncomfortable to consummate the marriage with This person, then seeing a black snake in her dream indicates this. The future with this fiancé will bring her many difficulties and she will not be happy with the divorce after her marriage to him. But if she sees the snake trying to enter her room but she cannot, then there is a barrier between the girl and her being wrong despite the presence of an evil friend in her life, but her religious upbringing protects her from evil vices. What is the interpretation of a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin? From Ibn Sirin’s point of view, the snake expresses the presence of a person close to the fortuneteller and whom he believes is loyal to him, but it shows the opposite in the future and makes the fortuneteller fall into many bad things that make him lose. Many, whether he was a student and failed in his studies, or he was young in the prime of his life. The age is to follow in the footsteps of Satan and follow this evil man, which makes him lose his respect and position in the hearts of those around him. If one sees in a dream that he is fighting a snake, but he overpowers it and kills it, then this is an unfair competition in the field of trade or business, but the dreamer is one who excels in his good management. By following the correct approach and not cheating in trade. But if he appears in a dream of a married woman and tries to approach her and harm her, then there is a woman in her husband’s life who is trying to distance him from his family and lure him to her, thus scattering his children. Small snakes represent enemies, but they are not as strong as the dreamer, but they are weak. Enough to overcome it easily. What is the interpretation of the snake in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream? He said

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone you love drowning

preview.html: If he regrets the drowning of someone he loves in the dream, this indicates the interruption of something important that he sought to happen in the coming period, such as a job or a trip to a specific place, and God knows best. Through the website gptafser.com/, we will talk about the interpretation of a loved one drowning in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of a vision. A dear person drowns in a dream about a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl sees a loved one drowning in a dream and she did not save him in the dream. It indicates a major failure in her future and that she will lose many opportunities in her life. She will be exposed to many disappointments during this period, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Such as: She likes to drown in a dream in front of her eyes in very dirty water. This indicates that she has fallen into some immoral things and sins in her life and she should be careful. It indicates that she is getting involved in bad things in her life and that it is exhausting and exhausting her a lot. While an unmarried girl who sees her loved ones in The dream was that she was drowning in clear water in the dream. This is a clear indication that she will collect a lot of money for herself in the near future, God willing. It also indicates the end of many difficult and bad things that she is going through and experiencing. See also: Interpretation of the dream of drowning in the sea and emerging from it. Interpretation Watching a loved one drown in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman seeing her husband drowning in dirty water in a dream did not save him. It is an indication that her husband will face some problems in his field of work in the near future for him. He is content with looking at him, and does not help or harass him, and God knows best. A married woman was looking at one of her family members in a dream drowning in clear water. It indicates the future life of this dreamer and that he will get a lot of money very soon. It also indicates that she married him if he did not marry with him during this period, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And a woman A married woman is trying to recover a drowning member of her family. It indicates that this person is enjoying his worldly desires and does not think about his future and the best. She is trying hard to get him out of this swamp he is living in at the present time for his sake, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing someone she loves drowning in a dream for a divorced woman and because A divorced woman sees her divorced woman drowning in the water. She tries to save him. She expresses her extreme fear of this former person in her life and that she still loves him. He always tries to monitor his news and find out what is new and exclusive about him, and God knows best. Also, a divorced woman looks at her loved one drowning. In a dream and asking her for help. This is an indication that there is a person in her life who intends her good intentions and asks her for help. It also indicates that she has entered into a new matter with a person in her life and she is very close to her in life. And if a divorced woman sees someone she knows and loves drowning in dirty water In a dream. This is an indication that this person you know lives in immorality and sins in his life. He must beware of this evil that is happening at this time, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of drowning in the sea and death. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a relationship in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing an engagement in a dream: Hookup can be the dream of every young man and girl and each of them is looking for a suitable partner or partner to create a beautiful family. Today we are across the street. DifferentWe will find out what it means to see an engagement in a dream about a young man and a girl in the following article. Courtship: Engagement is the period that begins with a question The young man is the girl he wants to marry and her family approves of her. Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream: The dream of an engagement in a dream is considered a sign of good and can indicate bad, according to the point of view: Seeing someone watching his engagement indicates that his life will change for the better. Whoever sees that he is watching his engagement With someone he knows or does not know, and he is happy, this indicates that he will achieve everything he wants. Interpretation of an unmarried young man or unmarried girl’s dream about his engagement, as this indicates a strong relationship, God willing. Seeing an engagement in a single woman’s dream: The dream of a girl is not A married woman getting engaged bodes well for her, indicating that her life will improve and that a good man will propose to her soon, especially if she sees that her engagement was on Friday. Anyone who sees that she is going to a friend’s engagement party while she is engaged indicates that her partner is not suitable for her and that she She does not want it. In general, seeing an engagement in a single woman’s dream is a sign of love and marriage. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a divorced woman. Seeing an engagement in a dream for a man: If an unmarried young man dreams that he is getting engaged to a girl, this indicates that he will fulfill his desire. And whoever dreams that He proposes to a virgin girl and it is approved, this indicates his success and obtaining his desire. As for someone who dreams that he is engaged to a married, widowed, or divorced woman, this indicates his failure and failure to achieve his desire, his surrender, or his delayed puberty. Whoever sees that he was at his engagement party and it ended, this indicates That he is the center of attention. Whoever sees that there is a girl who has proposed to him, this indicates that his life will improve for the better and increase in money. Anyone who was poor and dreams of participating shows that his period is approaching. Whoever is in power and dreams of participating, this indicates his promotion to a higher position. Whoever sees that he is engaged to a strong girl, this indicates imprisonment. If a person dreams that he is engaged to a girl with a bad reputation, this means that he has committed adultery. Whoever sees that a girl of beautiful origin and the intention of getting engaged is engaged, then he is already engaged, but if he is not worthy of marriage, then he will He uses drugs. Whoever sees that he is engaged to an ugly girl and is forced to do so, this indicates that he is forced in his life to do something that he does not want. As for the married man: If a married man dreams of getting engaged to a girl he knows, this indicates his success and the realization of his desire. If a married man dreams that he Engaged to a girl he does not know, this means that his life is close. If a married man dreams of being engaged to a beautiful girl, this indicates the fulfillment of his desires. If a married man dreams of marrying a girl with a relationship and lineage, this indicates that he is using drugs. If a married man dreams that he is engaged to a girl who does not He wants her, this indicates that he is doing something that he does not want. If a married man dreams of getting engaged to a girl with bad hearing

title: I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I asked for a divorce

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I asked for a divorce. What is the interpretation of a dream that my husband married Ali and I asked for a divorce? This is one of the explanations that puts married women in a state of constant stress, and it is one of the most difficult feelings that any woman can experience when she discovers that her husband is married. You can dream through the various website with knowledge of the details of the interpretation of my dream that my husband married Ali and I asked for a divorce. Interpretation: I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I asked for a divorce. A group of psychologists believes that the dream of marrying another woman is one of the common dreams that appear in the dreams of many women as a result of thinking about it for a long time or Because of suspicion about the husband. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that a man’s marriage to another woman means leaving his current job and being assigned a new job. Al-Nabulsi says that a woman’s crying over her husband’s marriage to another woman indicates that her husband will approach her in the coming period with the children. Ibn Shaheen says that a woman’s crying over her husband’s marriage to another woman indicates that her husband will approach her in the coming period with the children. Her husband marrying another woman indicates a lot of livelihood and luxury that the woman will obtain in the coming period. I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I am upset. If you are wondering about a dream that my husband married Ali and asked for a divorce, the answer is that if a woman sees that her husband has married her, it may be because of preoccupation. The husband is with his wife for a period of time because of work and not because he is already married. Dream interpreters say that the husband’s marriage to another woman indicates that the husband will travel for work for several years, which leaves the woman in a bad psychological state. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the husband’s marriage to another woman indicates the approaching pregnancy and childbirth for the same person. The wife and the husband’s preoccupation with the new baby and this happy event. Al-Asidi says that the husband’s marriage to another indicates that there are some changes in the husband’s life and these changes will be positive in the work environment. Interpretation of a dream about my husband Ali getting married and giving birth to two sons. Dream interpreters believe that the husband who marries his wife and gives birth to a male child indicates that this The husband will bring his wife great wealth and a great living in the coming period. If the dreamer is late in giving birth, then the husband’s marriage to another woman and the birth of a male child portends the imminent marriage of this woman and the birth of a male child in the near future. If the husband marries his wife, sister, mother, or one of his mahrams. This means separation of the husband from his family because it is taboo. Read also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead person preparing food in a dream. I dreamed that my husband got married and I was pregnant. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband has married her and she has been pregnant for the past few months, this means that the date of birth is approaching and she must prepare. If a woman dreams that her husband has married a beautiful woman above her, this means that she will give birth to a very beautiful child. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is crying over her husband’s marriage to another woman, this means that she will be relieved from the pain and fatigue of pregnancy that she is suffering from, and there will be Good news for her in easy childbirth if God. If a woman sees that the husband married his wife while she is pregnant, this means the birth of the woman who saw the same dream, especially if she is late pregnant. If the woman sees that her husband is married to

If a pregnant woman sees that her husband has married her and she has been pregnant for the past few months, this means that the date of birth is approaching and she must prepare. If a woman dreams that her husband has married a beautiful woman above her, this means that she will give birth to a very beautiful child. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is crying over her husband’s marriage to another woman, this means that she will be relieved from the pain and fatigue of pregnancy that she is suffering from, and there will be Good news for her in easy childbirth if God. If a woman sees that the husband married his wife while she is pregnant, this means the birth of the woman who saw the same dream, especially if she is late pregnant. title: Interpretation of a dream about apples

Apples have many beneficial benefits for the health of the human body as a result of their richness in many of the vitamins that the body needs. Apples in a dream mean that you have a lot of wisdom and do not make decisions without thinking about them. title: Interpretation of dreams about traveling by plane

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing traveling by plane in a dream: Traveling is one of the most fun and difficult things that many people love. Seeing travel in a dream does not mean that a person is likely to travel alone, but there are many other, deeper meanings and interpretations related to the dream of travel, most of which are interpretations that are not positive and worrying, but the good thing is that they remain just possibilities. An airplane in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing travel in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirini. The traveler refers to his journey in two things, either in movement or in space, so it is possible that the dreamer of the trip interprets the command to sweep the earth, and the opposite is evidence of either of them, even if he sees him sweeping the earth, then. This is amazing . It means a journey. The presence of a car or an animal in a dream has meanings that depend on its condition. In the event that this dreamer is traveling on a specific type of animal, it is possible for him to ride it, and there are interpretations that riding itself on any type is a sign of goodness, glory and desire. But if he drove it without realizing it while driving it, or sat anxiously or unsteadily or at the beginning of it. , it means that he is a man who follows his whims, and vice versa, if the command is properly controlled and configured while driving. This is evidence of his safety from him. Follow and satisfy a desire that was in his desires. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a plane traveling in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained to one of the dream tellers who came to him that he dreamed of his journey between heaven and earth. This dream is evidence of his many desires and his interpretation of going around the mountains. I explained that the dreamer will do that. . . It has an arrangement or location in which the question of kings is heard. It was said about seeing a flying spirit that whoever sees it has the ability and qualities to rule and authority, this one has it, and if he sees it in a dream that it has fallen in a place, area, or anything else, then he will. He becomes her king. But if he does not have these qualities, then the evidence in his dream is that he was afflicted with a serious illness from which he may die, or a religious error that he committed or committed in his religion appears in him. Even the second with another woman. Flying in a dream is evidence of travel. If there are wings during the dream, and by passing and changing from one road to another, this means that you see him stopping the bird that has reached its destination and kissing it. To travel, but on a journey from a place where he came to earth to speak, means pleasure and honor. And to fly, if his character is from bottom to top without wings, then the meaning is that he fulfills his desire and obtains it, and his rank will be above the destiny he saw rising, and the state of the dream, if Like a bird, he was evidence of glory, and his disappearance in flight in the sky was a sign of his death. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a return from a trip in a dream about someone living in reality. Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision, referring to it as fulfilling a duty or right towards him, or meaning his departure from those who comfort him. It saves him from evil or from sinners. It is repentance for sins. Interpretation of a dream about seeing travel in a dream for a single womanIf a single woman interprets her dream, if it is good, then this is an indication that she is trying to change by creating new events in her relationships and life in general, a

title: Interpretation of transformation in a dream: Seeing someone transforming in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The transformation of a girl into a boy, and a young man into an older child, into a small animal or bird, a vision of a person younger than his age, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Whoever dreams that he has changed from justice to corruption, then he will not be praised, and whoever sees something contrary to that, then he will He makes an effort to pay attention to religion and this world and to gain money. If a woman dreams that she has become a man during her relationship with a woman or marriage to a woman, then goodness, honor, glory, and high memory will affect her. And whoever dreams that he has become an animal whose meat cannot be eaten, then this is humiliation and a calamity, and if He has an act that is isolated from him. Seeing a person as if he has grown old in a dream indicates justice in religion and an increase in honor. Likewise, if a woman sees that she has turned into an old woman, this means justice in her religion and in worldly matters. Whoever turns into a boy in a dream, indicates actions and deeds that He does it which is characterized by ignorance, and this dream is often deserved. Seeing himself transforming into a child in a dream indicates weakness, weakness, and dependence on others. If an old man sees himself transforming into a young man in a dream, then the dream indicates recovery if he is sick, wealth if he is poor, and the return of The world after its end. Whoever sees that it is long shows longevity. Whoever dreams of shortening something important in his life, it may be selling a house or a car, losing a job, or an insult he may be exposed to, and he may fear death. Seeing a decrease in something in one’s body is a decrease in the dreamer’s world. Whoever dreams that A boy, so there is no good in him in any way, then he desires and acts ignorantly. And if a woman sees that she is old or half-old and she is not, then this is in the interest of her religion and her worldly life. Whoever sees an old man in a dream has become young, and if he is poor, he will become rich, and if he is one of those who manage He returns to his earthly life, even if he is sick. He will recover from his illness. Anyone who sees that he has become a soft, beautiful branch will die quickly, and whoever dreams that he has the image of a woman and her adornments will suffer humiliation and sadness within him, unless he sees that he has returned to his state. It has been said: If he is in a dispute, let his opponent reconcile with him, for the argument is against him, and if he reconciles with him, his need will be satisfied. And if a woman sees that he has become a man and there is no son, she will communicate with him, and if she is pregnant, she will give birth to a son, and if she is not pregnant, she will never give birth to a son, and if she gives birth to a son, The boy dies before reaching puberty. Perhaps the interpretation went to its values ​​or to its owner, and it had a reference to people and an honor due to the magnitude of the greatness of memory. Whoever transforms his body in a dream into the body of one of the animals, even if there are seven of them, then he has control over others through his money or power and the severity of his cruelty or his cunning and deceit. And if it is an animal that can be eaten, then It indicates his kindness or humiliation. Whoever dreams that he flies with his wings, he is traveling on a journey of power as long as he has excelled on earth. Whoever dreams that his body is made of clay, there will be no survival for him. Whoever dreams that he is made of iron, his life will be long. And whoever dreams of building an arch or a bridge that people can pass over, he will become a sultan. Or the owner of the Sultan, or an equivalent of the Sultan, or a scholar through whom people reach their affairs. Whoever dreams that he has turned into a stick, there is no good in him, for it is corruption in his life

title: Interpretation of a dream about money for a single woman by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about someone giving me money to a single woman and interpretation of a dream about giving money to a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about money for a single woman: It has various meanings, including praise and mockery. Money is a double-edged sword. It can be used to achieve difficult ambitions and goals and help others, and through it it can cause harm to others. The vision of money depends on several factors, including the person carrying it, what he does with it, the purpose of obtaining it, as well as the nature, condition and type of the money, and the role of the dreamer in relation to it and his dealings with it. Interpretation of the dream of money for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the dream of money for a single woman? Many agree. Interpreters state that seeing money in a dream is a praiseworthy vision most of the time and can be interpreted depending on the type and condition of the coin in circulation, in addition to where it was found, the person who owns it, and the relationship of the viewer with him. If the visionary counts the coins in front of her, this is a sign that she will find A new job or she will assume an important administrative position that will bring her countless profits and gains that will carry her to a more luxurious standard of living. The near future. Also, seeing a paper currency with a large, new denomination of cash indicates that the student is on the verge of achieving a cherished goal, which she has sought greatly in the past and for which she has made intense efforts. However, if she sees that she is holding in her hand a pot full of coins that she keeps, this means She is a famous personality among people and has characteristics that distinguish her and make her a good place in everyone's heart. He gets to know her. While you see that she is distributing money to people, she is a girl who will have great power and influence in the future and will enjoy a good reputation among everyone and can control many of her workers and employees. Interpretation of a dream about money for a single woman by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin believes that the unmarried woman, who sees herself in... Having a lot of money in her hand is a sign that the coming days will bring her many happy omens and happy news about her future in many areas, whether personal or emotional. Also, seeing coins scattered on the road indicates the dreamer’s integrity and adherence to her religion and the customs she grew up with, regardless of Regardless of the temptations she faces in life. But if she sees that she is distributing paper money between herself and a stranger, this means that she will soon enter into a business partnership with a famous businessman and achieve profitable trade and great fame among people, and its branches will spread throughout the world. International. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Interpretation of dreams of someone giving me money in exchange for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees that a member of her family is giving her a lot of banknotes, this is a sign that the next few days will bring her many happy events and long-awaited reassuring news. But if an unmarried woman sees a strange young man offering her a lot of money, this indicates that she will marry a very wealthy man who will take her life to a different level full of wealth.

title: Learn about the interpretation of the words of a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: When a person dies and dies, he has nothing to do with the living except through dreams, and the dead visit us in dreams for some purpose, perhaps to send a message or warn about something or ask for something, what is the interpretation? The words of the dead in a dream? This is what we present in the following lines. Speech The dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the dead person’s words in a dream? The interpretation of the dream about the dead person’s words is good or bad according to what he says, because the dead never lie because he is in the hands of his Lord. When you see the dead in a dream talking to the living and asking for bread, this vision indicates that the dead They need alms and prayers. The crying of a dead person while talking in a dream indicates the recovery of the sick person, the return of the absent person, and the return of deposits to their owners. Whoever sees that the dead person is eating while talking while sleeping, this vision indicates the good condition of the dead person and his comfort in his grave. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating with the dead while he is sleeping, this vision indicates the good condition of the dead person and his comfort in his grave. Their conversation portends a lot of goodness on its way and abundant supplies. The speech of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The speech of the dead to the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin may mean that the dreamer will reconcile with a person between whom he has enmity, while seeing the dead person laughing and talking with him is a sign of longevity. Seeing the dead person will reconcile with a person with whom he has enmity. He comes back to life and the person addresses him, which indicates that he is benefiting or benefiting from something he despaired of and thinks he will not gain anything from. The dead person saying in his conversation with the living that he did not die is an indication of a good ending and the rank of martyrs that he won in Paradise. A specialized Egyptian website that includes A group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Speech of a dead person in a dream for an unmarried woman. If the dead person talks to the girl and gives her something he likes, this is a good vision and a good omen for the unmarried girl. Her dead father in a dream. If the dead man proposes to her and talks to her about religious matters, this means that her religion is righteous, and she performs worship and duties to the fullest extent. If the deceased tells her that he will get married soon, then he will get married very soon, because the deceased’s statements are all true. The words of the dead in dreams for married people, if she sees For a married woman, if a dead man calls her in a dream and goes with him or accompanies him to the entrance of an abandoned house, this means that the death of this woman is near, because the abandoned house is a symbol of her. The afterlife. If she sees that she is sitting with more than one dead person and talking to them, then she is in a relationship with hypocrites, and if the dead person tells her that she is pregnant or something related to her current life, then this is an event that will happen in the future. Seeing a dead married woman talking about life in a dream is a good sign and kindness increases. When you eat from it, and if you eat with a deceased person in a dream, this is good news that may mean a new job that the husband wants. Takes. The words of the dead in a dream for pregnant women. Seeing a dead pregnant woman talking to the living in a dream is a warning message to her. If the deceased in a dream gives something to a pregnant woman while talking to her, then this is good news for a safe birth and indicates an abundance of goodness, and the dream may indicate the end of disputes between her and her. Her husband, if she exists. If she speaks,
